casebody.data:
Rafael MARTINEZ, petitioner,
v.
Thomas LaVALLEY, Superintendent, Clinton Correctional Facility, et al. No. 13-8648. Supreme Court of the United States April 21, 2014. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied. Justice SOTOMAYOR took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
